Combat Notes:
Agile Maneuvers: +1 CMB

Shield Focus: +1 AC

Toughness: +9 HP
Weapon Finesse: +1 light melee weapon attack (Dexterity instead of Strength)

Blind-Fight: May reroll miss due to concealment/Invisible foe gains no melee bonus/Requires no skill check to move full speed when blinded
Catch Off-Guard: Using an improvised melee weapon inflicts no penalty and makes unarmed foes flat-footed
Combat Expertise: May suffer up to -3 attack to gain equal AC bonus
Combat Reflexes: May take AOO while flat-footed and 3 AOO/rd
Critical Focus: +4 crit confirm
Deadly Aim: May suffer -3 ranged attack to gain +6 damage
Disruptive: +4 foe defensive spell DC
Improved Shield Bash: Suffers no AC penalty when using Shield Bash
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO and may inflict lethal damage
Lunge: May suffer -2 AC to gain +5' melee range
Mounted Combat: Successful Ride skill check (DC foe attack roll) negates mount damage 1/rd
Point-Blank Shot: +1 ranged attack and damage w/in 30'
Power Attack: May suffer -3 attack to gain +6 damage (+9 when wielding weapon w/two hands)
Quick Draw: May draw a weapon as a free action
Rapid Reload (Light): May reload a light crossbow as a free action
Run: Retains Dexterity bonus to AC while running
Step Up: May match foe 5' step
Strike Back: May ready melee attack against melee foes that are out of range
Throw Anything: No penalty for improvised ranged weapon, +1 attack w/thrown splash
Two-Weapon Fighting: Reduces on-hand penalty by 2 and off-hand by 6
Vital Strike: 2x base damage
Weapon Training: +2/+1 attack, damage, CMB, and CMD w/weapons from chosen groups
Save: Fortitude: +8; Reflex: +7; Will: +7
